name: dsQa
doc: Quaity Assurance. Set for unique targeting during testing

name: dsForm
doc: The form HTML elment id the DsSelect select element belongs to

name: dsLabel
doc: Label text displayed over the Select

name: dsDefaultOptionId
doc: Default selected option id. Provide as id of option you want to be selected by default

name: dsPlaceholder
doc: Placeholder. Displayed only if no dsDefaultValue provided

name: dsOnChange
doc: Event callback on user selecting an option

name: dsClass
doc: Support for adding Classes to element

name: disabled
doc: Native properties from HTML5, React etc. are not prefixed

name: id
doc: Support for adding ID attribute to element
